summary: Ronja is a female Breton follower, specializing in Light Armor, Sneak, One-Handed and Destruction. Find her in the Ragged Flagon.
descriptionHtml:
-----------
Description
-----------

This plugin adds Ronja Darkblade, a female Breton follower, to the Ragged Flagon in Riften. By default she wears rags and fights as a stealthy spellsword (custom class). At the moment she is fairly basic and uses a default female voice. She can be married. Also, she functions as a merchant and has about 20,000 gold from a recent heist. Apachii's SkyHair is required. Other than that, she should work with the vanilla game or with your favorite follower management system. I recommend EFF and Convenient Horses.

This Skyrim follower is based on the name and sketches of one of my original fictional characters.

Required:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]Apachii's SkyHair[/url]

Recommended:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933//?]Extensible Follower Framework (EFF)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950//?]Convenient Horses[/url]


------------
Installation
------------

Installation:
With NMM, simply download the mod and activate it.

Manual Installation:
Extract the archive and drag the contents to your .\Skyrim\Data\ folder. From your launcher, check UR_Ronja.esp.

Play the game and find Ronja in the Ragged Flagon.

Files:
.\UR_Ronja.esp
.\meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\UR_Ronja.esp\0000433F.NIF
.\textures\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\UR_Ronja.esp\0000433F.dds


---------------
Version History
---------------

0.12 - Ronja should now purchase stolen items.

0.1 - Initial release.
author: Undead Rufus
